Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Cost of War

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Bringing global investors everything you need to know as the trading day begins in Asia. Bloomberg TV is live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: From politics and policy to tech and trends, Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors insight into the world's second-biggest economy, delivering in-depth discussions with newsmakers.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: In an effort to provide extensive coverage of worldwide financial markets, Bloomberg features several regional shows under the "Bloomberg Markets" banner, with each focusing on that geographic area's markets. This Asian-focused version is hosted by Shery Ahn, David Ingles, Haidi Lun, Rishaad Salamat and Angie Lau. They report the latest business news and speak with the likes of political and business leaders to help investors make investment decisions that build their portfolios.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: A spotlight on the fast paced growth and major deals happening across the Middle East and Africa, linking the market drivers from overnight in the U.S. and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep-dive analysis of the top businesses.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: From London, essential morning viewing to stay ahead of the day's market trends with news stories from the U.S. and Asia in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg The Opening Trade
programme.desc: "The Opening Trade" explores things to know as markets open across Europe; analysis that isn't available anywhere else, a break down of the biggest stories of the day and top guests who have skin in the game.

programme.title: Live: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Based in London, Francine Lacqua speaks with guests about global business, economics, finance and politics.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Delivering the market-moving news anyone needs to know to get a jump start on the U.S. trading day.

programme.title: Live: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: Technology is not only becoming an increasingly important part of people's lives but also of the American economy. "Bloomberg Technology" takes a look at how the latest happenings in the tech industry are affecting the U.S. markets. Analysis, commentary, interviews and interactive graphics are among the staples of the show that help viewers understand the impact the technology sector has on the economy. The show, which was originally titled "Bloomberg West," is anchored by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Cash Cab

If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash - up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show - with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot - as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: La SRU, Unité de réponse stratégique, est une unité d'élite de la police de Toronto, au Canada, spécialisée dans les opérations paramilitaires. Les missions musclées et extrêmes, prises d'otages, désamorçages de bombes, protection de personnalités, sont dont le lot quotidien de ces hommes et ces femmes surentraînés, qui n'hésitent pas à risquer leur vie pour sauver celle des autres. Série déclinée en cinq saisons (la cinquième étant aussi la dernière), "Flashpoint" nous immerge dans le quotidien de policiers d'élite, inspirés de la Toronto's Emergency Task Force.

programme.desc: Diagnosed with multiple sclerosis in her 20s, Kat Finnerty was told she'd be in a wheelchair by 40. programme.title: Alabanzas Infantiles

programme.title: Estrellitas de Jesús
programme.desc: Programa infantil que imparte principios y valores para educar el carácter de los pequeños, se incluyen alabanzas, historias de la Biblia, juegos y aprendizaje de destrezas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E14 Surveyors Mark overhears men plotting to rob the North Fork Bank while at a surveying camp and tells Lucas about what he heard. When Lucas questions his story, Mark runs away from home. Lucas later learns Mark was telling the truth and helps capture the men.

programme.title: County Line: No Fear
programme.desc: When Sheriff Alden Rockwell finally decides to retire, a threat against the father of his friend, Sheriff Jo Porter, may not only ruin his plans for a life of leisure but also bring a dangerous criminal syndicate to both Maksville and York counties.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

"Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a rope-swinging episode of The Cowboy Way! After their restaurant venture, each of the cowboys takes some quality time to reconnect with family and discuss their futures. Cody decides to make the ranch high-tech, but will it be a success or will he get his wires crossed? Bubba plays locksmith for Booger's truck. A missing cow gets stuck in the woods. The guys use Booger's annual horse clinic as a way to give back to the community. And get ready for matchmaking the cowboy way! When the boys set up a mixer for bachelors Frankie and Hodge, speed-dating turns into a literal horse race to win the ladies' affections.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E1 Big Deal The guys are back in the saddle on The Cowboy Way! Their dreams of making it big have finally arrived with a million-dollar business opportunity, but only if they can come up with half the cash. While the cowboys struggle with how to raise the money, Bubba is torn if he should ask his father-in-law for help. Booger teaches Matthew to be a real cowboy and gives him his first pony! But when Jaclyn misses this big milestone, she questions if her demanding job is keeping her from her family. And finally, Cody's mission to teach kids about the importance of ranching leads him to take on the Cattlemen's Association. How far will he go to make his point?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E11 The Apprentice Sheriff Dan Willard fills in as deputy while Marshal Micah Torrance is away on business. Meanwhile, Texas cowhands come to town looking for fun and relaxation. When Dan tries to prove that his toughness, those actions backfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Angry Gun Lucas and Mark, returning after selling their herd, share the stagecoach trip with a marshal and his prisoner, Johnny Cotton. Johnny's gang stops and robs the stagecoach, while Johnny steals Lucas' gun and profits. Lucas is forced to track him down.

programme.title: Trinity Is Still My Name
programme.desc: Two brothers promise their dying father they'll become the notorious bandits he always wanted them to be. While the older brother intends to teach his younger brother outlaw skills, the two save a pioneer family and break up an arms ring instead.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E21 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 1 The Kid and Lou's special day is approaching, and the riders prepare for the couple's upcoming wedding. Teaspoon is upset over when the Army arrives in Rock Creek to recruit young men as scouts. Meanwhile, the townspeople brace for the Civil War.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E22 The Boarding House Julia Andueza opens a boarding house in North Fork. Lucas remembers her as a dishonest card dealer from the past. Her old boss arrives and tries to bully Julia into turning her business into a gambling house. Lucas realizes she has changed her ways.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E2 New Sheriff in Town It's back to basics on The Cowboy Way as the guys work to rotate cattle off a lightning-struck field to fresh grass, but the routine wrangle suddenly heads south as the herd scatters, jumping and taking down part of a fence. Kaley wonders about finances and if she should find work, while Bubba invests in a starter herd for daughter Andie's Cowgirl College Fund. Jaclyn rushes to prepare for Matthew's 4th birthday party and anxiously waits for news after a job interview. Booger's parents have a special birthday surprise for Matthew. As the Cattlemen's Association Ambassador, Cody gets a call from a local farmer and meets their autistic son Tristan. Misty gives Cody an idea how to share the cowboy way lifestyle with this special boy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: These guys can wrangle any bull, but can they tame a wild bulldozer? In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys decide to build a new barn for a local rancher but it's man versus machine when Bubba's dozer breaks a pipeline, releasing a torrent of water. Jaclyn admits to her boss she's been looking for a job closer to home, then worries it might get her fired altogether. Will her family have to survive on one income? Cody decides to write a book about the cowboy way of life, but he may have bitten off more than he can chew. The cowboys struggle to get the barn raised in time to process the first shipment of the herd and might have to call in some favors to do it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E13 The Young Englishman Lucas and Mark discover a young calf is missing and traces it to the nearby Ashford Ranch run by an Englishman. When Lucas accuses foreman Norv Waggoner of cattle rustling to build up his own herd, Norv plans retaliation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E14 The Gaucho Curge Palmer is upset after Argentinian Juan Argentez bought a ranch he wanted. Palmer insults Argentez and his children, Nita and Manolo. Meanwhile, Manolo's anger over who is courting Nita gets him into trouble when her suitor is found dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Texas Fence-Cutting War When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A sudden and swift series of murders occurs in southwestern Texas, sending Big Bend country into a frenzy. All parties are suspicious of a young rambler who just moved to the area, believing his presence must be related to the crimes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E22 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 2 The Kid and Lou's wedding day arrives. The advancement of the Civil War forces the riders to take sides. Jesse must choose between his brother Frank or his friends in the Pony Express. An encounter with renegade rebels ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E10 Land Beyond the Law Cheyenne is on the run from the law for a crime that he did not commit in Lone Butte. To clear his name, he must infiltrate the Ellwood Gang to find the killer. His only clues are the killer's hideout and unusual belt buckle.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E11 Test of Courage A frustrated Army post commander court-martials Cheyenne for cowardice after he abandons a herd of needed Army horses. The commander wants answers and orders Cheyenne to take them to a desolate cavalry base used during enemy strikes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E2 New Sheriff in Town It's back to basics on The Cowboy Way as the guys work to rotate cattle off a lightning-struck field to fresh grass, but the routine wrangle suddenly heads south as the herd scatters, jumping and taking down part of a fence. Kaley wonders about finances and if she should find work, while Bubba invests in a starter herd for daughter Andie's Cowgirl College Fund. Jaclyn rushes to prepare for Matthew's 4th birthday party and anxiously waits for news after a job interview. Booger's parents have a special birthday surprise for Matthew. As the Cattlemen's Association Ambassador, Cody gets a call from a local farmer and meets their autistic son Tristan. Misty gives Cody an idea how to share the cowboy way lifestyle with this special boy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: These guys can wrangle any bull, but can they tame a wild bulldozer? In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys decide to build a new barn for a local rancher but it's man versus machine when Bubba's dozer breaks a pipeline, releasing a torrent of water. Jaclyn admits to her boss she's been looking for a job closer to home, then worries it might get her fired altogether. Will her family have to survive on one income? Cody decides to write a book about the cowboy way of life, but he may have bitten off more than he can chew. The cowboys struggle to get the barn raised in time to process the first shipment of the herd and might have to call in some favors to do it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E13 The Young Englishman Lucas and Mark discover a young calf is missing and traces it to the nearby Ashford Ranch run by an Englishman. When Lucas accuses foreman Norv Waggoner of cattle rustling to build up his own herd, Norv plans retaliation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E14 The Gaucho Curge Palmer is upset after Argentinian Juan Argentez bought a ranch he wanted. Palmer insults Argentez and his children, Nita and Manolo. Meanwhile, Manolo's anger over who is courting Nita gets him into trouble when her suitor is found dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Texas Fence-Cutting War When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A sudden and swift series of murders occurs in southwestern Texas, sending Big Bend country into a frenzy. All parties are suspicious of a young rambler who just moved to the area, believing his presence must be related to the crimes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E22 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 2 The Kid and Lou's wedding day arrives. The advancement of the Civil War forces the riders to take sides. Jesse must choose between his brother Frank or his friends in the Pony Express. An encounter with renegade rebels ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E10 Land Beyond the Law Cheyenne is on the run from the law for a crime that he did not commit in Lone Butte. To clear his name, he must infiltrate the Ellwood Gang to find the killer. His only clues are the killer's hideout and unusual belt buckle.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E11 Test of Courage A frustrated Army post commander court-martials Cheyenne for cowardice after he abandons a herd of needed Army horses. The commander wants answers and orders Cheyenne to take them to a desolate cavalry base used during enemy strikes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E4 Keep on Chuckin' It's The Cowboy Way's first road trip ever! Bubba, Cody and Booger cut loose and head north to enter a big chuck wagon race. But they quickly discover this race is not for amateurs. Loose wagon wheels, knee-deep mud and professional-grade competition raise both the stakes, and their concerns. Will the guys risk life and limb to race and win? And while the cowboys are away, a surprise shipment of cattle comes in days early and their wives must jump into action. But this drop off is anything but routine when Kaley and Misty discover one heifer has an infection that could threaten the entire herd.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger goes back to school! On this episode of The Cowboy Way, the cowboys visit the Montgomery Stockyard to research cattle prices and Booger gets bitten by the auctioneering bug. Will his auctioneering classes pay off? Back at the ranch, the guys catch heat from a neighbor when their herd escapes into his field, and a rebellious heifer takes them on one heck of a ride. Misty's brother-in-law, Chip, stops by and gives Cody an earful that his feeding pasture has turned to dirt. And when the cattle stock market takes a nosedive, the cowboys' million-dollar business partner calls the gang into his office for a tough talk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Pet Lucas and Mark find out a pony they adopted after the owner was killed may have anthrax. Fears of an epidemic rise in town. Meanwhile, the killer comes to the McCain Ranch thinking that Lucas has valuable information.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E16 The Sheridan Story At the end of the Civil War, General Sheridan and his staff arrive at the McCain Ranch. Trouble begins when ex-confederate soldier and hired hand Frank Blandon confronts the general, who shot and wounded him in the war.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E11 Battle Beneath the Mountain For months, a thin wall of rock is all that keeps the peace between two rival silver mining companies 300 feet below the Idaho desert. When the barrier is finally breached, pickaxes give way to pistols and rifles, and the miners battle for five days.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Kid The Kid becomes part of a group of six Pony Express riders in the Old West based at the Sweetwater Station in the Nebraska territory. He meets station master, Teaspoon Hunter, and fellow riders, Buck, Jimmy, Ike, Cody and Lou.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E12 War Party While out on an Army mission, Cheyenne shoots a miner in self-defense. He stays to help the miner and his wife, but dangers loom when the Sioux arrive. Their sights are on the miner's wife and his gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E13 Deadline While Cheyenne works for Charley Dolan, he finds himself in the middle of a battle between Dolan and Len Garth, a gang leader who forces Dolan and others off their land. Garth soon burns the newspaper office, but Dolan aims to rebuild.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E4 Keep on Chuckin' It's The Cowboy Way's first road trip ever! Bubba, Cody and Booger cut loose and head north to enter a big chuck wagon race. But they quickly discover this race is not for amateurs. Loose wagon wheels, knee-deep mud and professional-grade competition raise both the stakes, and their concerns. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The cowboys head west to Louisiana in this episode of The Cowboy Way! The boys hit the road to find the perfect bull for their herd, if Booger's backseat antics don't drive them all crazy first. They discover a cowboy candy store where a famous saddle maker fits Bubba's horse for a custom saddle. Cody gets challenged to a roping contest by some teenagers. And when they accidentally find themselves in the fanciest restaurant in town, the guys test their cowboy palate with fine French cuisine. Escargot anyone? Back home Jaclyn and Kaley try hot yoga for their first and maybe last time, and Misty takes a shine to modeling.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E17 The Retired Gun Wes Carney, a famous gunfighter, and his new wife Clair move to North Fork. They open a store and settle down. However, three outlaws come to town to challenge him. Carney refuses and they ransack his store, forcing him to put his gunbelt back on.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E18 The Photographer Abel Goss is doing a portrait of Mark standing on a North Fork street. Suddenly he sees Colonel Whiteside and his sidekick, Jamison. When he recognizes them as the cruel men who tortured him in a Civil War prison camp, problems soon arise.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E10 Jim Roberts Cleans Up Jerome In his first week on the job as the new constable of Jerome, Arizona, Jim Roberts gets to work arresting the town's troublemakers and teaching his timid deputy how to be a courageous lawman as they track down a stone-cold killer and his gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E2 Gunfighter Childhood memories are torturing Jimmy. When he accidentally spooks a horse, the man riding it is insulted. The man, Longley, is a hired gun and demands an apology. Teaspoon tries to help Jimmy with his issues, but he decides to fight the man.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E14 Big Ghost Basin Cheyenne finds a dead man's body and strange signs from the mysterious killer on a trail to Crowheart. When he arrives in town with the body, the townspeople suspect him to be a member of the rustler gang that's responsible.

programme.title: Drone Racing
programme.desc: The world's best drone pilots race their machines at high speeds.

programme.title: Enthusiast Gaming
programme.desc: Movies, TV shows, video games, current events, books, and more.

programme.title: POG RX
programme.desc: Medical doctor and Esports science expert, GamerDoc, shows how to make a better gaming environment.

programme.title: Emergence Days
programme.desc: Some of the best Gears 5 teams battle it out in a single elimination bracket in week 6.

programme.title: Chess
programme.desc: Highlights of championships from around the world.

programme.title: Preediction
programme.desc: A variety of the best esports talk-shows.

programme.title: Arena Esports
programme.desc: The best of Esports every week - the major news, developments and highlights from the biggest esports tournaments. Features on the teams, players and more. New episode every Wednesday.

programme.title: ITG Daily
programme.desc: Reviews of video games; interviews with developers; virtual reality; game on segment.

programme.title: PUBG Global Invitational
programme.desc: Twenty top professional PUBG teams from around the world will compete for $2 million in prizes and the ultimate PUBG bragging rights. From Mercedes-Benz Arena in Berlin, Germany.

programme.title: PUBG Global Invitational
programme.desc: Twenty top professional PUBG teams from around the world will compete for $2 million in prizes and the ultimate PUBG bragging rights. From Mercedes-Benz Arena in Berlin, Germany.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Apache Natives are after Ellen (Bibi Andersson), her baby, and her husband, William (Dennis Weaver). The family crosses paths with Jess (James Garner), a man who is trying to find out who killed his own wife, a Native American woman. He begins to travel with the couple, but the trailing Apaches soon chase them all into a canyon. Jess is able to escape the situation and alert nearby soldiers. In the process, he also discovers a shocking revelation about his wife's death.

programme.title: Thunder Over the Plains
programme.desc: It's the late 1860s, and the U.S. government has yet to reclaim Texas as a state. A group of opportunistic and amoral Northerners head south to claim the territory as their own. Though Texas lawman Capt. Porter (Randolph Scott) believes it's his duty to honor the local leaders, he can't ignore the corruption of the Yankee politicians who are giving him orders. When Confederate veteren Ben (Charles McGraw) is unjustly sentenced to death, Porter decides he has had enough of his new bosses.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: At an Army barracks in Hawaii in the days preceding the attack on Pearl Harbor, lone-wolf soldier and boxing champion Prew Prewitt (Montgomery Clift) refuses to box, preferring to play the bugle instead. Hard-hearted Capt. Holmes (Philip Ober) subjects Prew to a grueling series of punishments while, unknown to Holmes, the gruff but fair Sgt. Warden (Burt Lancaster) engages in a clandestine affair with the captain's mistreated wife (Deborah Kerr).

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep
programme.desc: After Japanese forces torpedo his submarine during World War II, commanding officer "Rich" Richardson (Clark Gable) is placed in charge of the USS Nerka. The crew on board the Nerka -- led by Lieutenant Jim Bledsoe (Burt Lancaster), who had been passed over for promotion when Richardson was brought in -- is openly hostile to their new commander, especially when it becomes clear that Richardson's sole obsession is finding and destroying the Japanese ship that sank his old vessel.

programme.title: This Sporting Life
programme.desc: Yorkshire coal miner Frank Machin (Richard Harris) picks a fight in a club and subsequently finds himself being recruited for a rugby team. He's an unpolished player, but his aggressiveness, brutality and indifference to the rules of fair play impress the team owners. Suddenly a rising star, Frank despairs that his success on the playing field isn't equaled in his personal life. He loves a widowed, emotionally challenged landlady (Rachel Roberts) who's too damaged to return his feelings.

programme.title: Please Murder Me
programme.desc: A lovesick attorney (Raymond Burr) tries to trap a murder client (Angela Lansbury) he got acquitted by arranging for her to kill him.

programme.title: The Last Horseman
programme.desc: A ranch foreman (Russell Hayden) and his buddies pose as women to get the jump on outlaws.

programme.title: Deputy Marshal
programme.desc: A lawman (Jon Hall) tracks bank robbers to Wyoming and gets wind of a railroad-land scam.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp tries to help an old friend, Bat Masterson, who is working as an Army scout and being threatened by a killer.

programme.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A distinguished scientist is behaving very oddly, his faithful dog attacks him, and his daughter is terrified.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: At an Army barracks in Hawaii in the days preceding the attack on Pearl Harbor, lone-wolf soldier and boxing champion Prew Prewitt (Montgomery Clift) refuses to box, preferring to play the bugle instead. Hard-hearted Capt. Holmes (Philip Ober) subjects Prew to a grueling series of punishments while, unknown to Holmes, the gruff but fair Sgt. Warden (Burt Lancaster) engages in a clandestine affair with the captain's mistreated wife (Deborah Kerr).

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep
programme.desc: After Japanese forces torpedo his submarine during World War II, commanding officer "Rich" Richardson (Clark Gable) is placed in charge of the USS Nerka. The crew on board the Nerka -- led by Lieutenant Jim Bledsoe (Burt Lancaster), who had been passed over for promotion when Richardson was brought in -- is openly hostile to their new commander, especially when it becomes clear that Richardson's sole obsession is finding and destroying the Japanese ship that sank his old vessel.

programme.title: The Last Horseman
programme.desc: A ranch foreman (Russell Hayden) and his buddies pose as women to get the jump on outlaws.

programme.title: Deputy Marshal
programme.desc: A lawman (Jon Hall) tracks bank robbers to Wyoming and gets wind of a railroad-land scam.

programme.title: Thunder Over the Plains
programme.desc: It's the late 1860s, and the U.S. government has yet to reclaim Texas as a state. A group of opportunistic and amoral Northerners head south to claim the territory as their own. Though Texas lawman Capt. Porter (Randolph Scott) believes it's his duty to honor the local leaders, he can't ignore the corruption of the Yankee politicians who are giving him orders. When Confederate veteren Ben (Charles McGraw) is unjustly sentenced to death, Porter decides he has had enough of his new bosses.

programme.title: Gentle Annie
programme.desc: After robbing a train, two brothers part with an unseen collaborator and go to a saloon, where they meet Lloyd Richland (James Craig), an undercover marshal investigating the crime. The thieves befriend Lloyd and waitress Mary (Donna Reed), taking them to the family home to meet their mother, Annie (Marjorie Main). With help from Mary, Lloyd realizes that his hosts are the robbers, and he learns the identity of the third robber as the brothers shoot it out with a corrupt local lawman.

programme.title: Vértigo
programme.desc: Hitchcock's romantic story of obsession, manipulation and fear. A detective is forced to retire after his fear of heights causes the death of a fellow officer and the girl he was hired to follow. He sees a double of the girl, causing him to transform her image onto the dead girl's body. This leads into a cycle of madness and lies.

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: During World War II, four Marines land on a Pacific island to execute the rescue of French planter Bouchard (Eduard Franz) and his daughter, Nina (Mary Murphy). With Japanese soldiers hidden throughout the dense jungle landscape, the Marines face a daunting trek to reach their target and must endure even greater danger on the return trip with the two French citizens. In the end, one of the Marines, Burke (Tony Curtis), carries the responsibility of getting everyone to safety.

programme.title: How I Spent My Summer Vacation
programme.desc: Invited aboard a millionaire's (Peter Lawford) yacht, a young man (Robert Wagner) begins to suspect a conspiracy of murder.

programme.title: Dick Tracy's Dilemma
programme.desc: Legendary police detective Dick Tracy (Ralph Byrd) and his faithful partner, Pat Patton (Lyle Latell), investigate the daring heist from a local warehouse of a recently insured fortune in furs. As the pair follows clues leading to shifty socialite Tess Trueheart (Kay Christopher), a growing body count at the morgue hints at the possibility of a serial killer on the loose. Tracy and Patton struggle to find the killer while working to unravel this high-fashion mystery.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Chico (Martin Garralaga) secure the deed to a woman's ranch.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp must defuse a conflict between warring families after Ollie and Mildred Taylor set up shop in Wichita and become targets of a man angry at Ollie's cousin for killing his brother; tensions escalate into a deadly struggle, then a lynch mob.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson match wits with an opera star intent on blackmailing a king.

programme.title: Vértigo
programme.desc: Hitchcock's romantic story of obsession, manipulation and fear. A detective is forced to retire after his fear of heights causes the death of a fellow officer and the girl he was hired to follow. He sees a double of the girl, causing him to transform her image onto the dead girl's body. This leads into a cycle of madness and lies.

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: During World War II, four Marines land on a Pacific island to execute the rescue of French planter Bouchard (Eduard Franz) and his daughter, Nina (Mary Murphy). With Japanese soldiers hidden throughout the dense jungle landscape, the Marines face a daunting trek to reach their target and must endure even greater danger on the return trip with the two French citizens. In the end, one of the Marines, Burke (Tony Curtis), carries the responsibility of getting everyone to safety.

programme.title: How I Spent My Summer Vacation
programme.desc: Invited aboard a millionaire's (Peter Lawford) yacht, a young man (Robert Wagner) begins to suspect a conspiracy of murder.

programme.title: Gentle Annie
programme.desc: After robbing a train, two brothers part with an unseen collaborator and go to a saloon, where they meet Lloyd Richland (James Craig), an undercover marshal investigating the crime. The thieves befriend Lloyd and waitress Mary (Donna Reed), taking them to the family home to meet their mother, Annie (Marjorie Main). With help from Mary, Lloyd realizes that his hosts are the robbers, and he learns the identity of the third robber as the brothers shoot it out with a corrupt local lawman.

programme.title: The First Texan
programme.desc: Having left his post as governor of Tennessee, Gen. Sam Houston (Joel McCrea) resettles in Mexican territory along the southwest U.S. border. He soon sets his sights on reclaiming the land under the aegis of Texas independence, while romancing post-divorce new love interest Katherine Delaney (Felicia Farr). His efforts eventually lead to the historic Battle of San Jacinto and a very clever bit of battlefield strategy by Houston in his fight against forces led by Gen. Santa Anna.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Battle Stations
programme.desc: Crewmen (John Lund, William Bendix, Keefe Brasselle) of an Essex class aircraft carrier train for action in the Pacific, then come home.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: A young married couple, Joe (Robert Cummings) and Betsey Bennet (Barbara Hale), are parents-to-be, expecting their first child. When the day arrives, the two frantically race to the hospital -- even smashing into a few trash cans along the way. With the delivery a success, Joe and Betsey get to discover what it's truly like being parents, beginning with the hospital bill. As the demands on their patience, wallets and time increase, Joe and Betsey are on the edge and close to falling off.

programme.title: Operation Pacific
programme.desc: In the South Pacific, submarine officer Duke Gifford (John Wayne) and the crew of the "Thunderfish" are attacked by the Japanese during a rescue mission, and their torpedoes malfunction. Returning safely to Pearl Harbor, Duke meets his ex-wife, Mary (Patricia Neal), who still feels strongly for him but is engaged to a pilot, the brother of Duke's commander, Pop Perry (Ward Bond). Determined to win Mary back, Duke is sidetracked when he and the crew are ordered on a mission with new torpedoes.

programme.title: The First Texan
programme.desc: Having left his post as governor of Tennessee, Gen. Sam Houston (Joel McCrea) resettles in Mexican territory along the southwest U.S. border. He soon sets his sights on reclaiming the land under the aegis of Texas independence, while romancing post-divorce new love interest Katherine Delaney (Felicia Farr). His efforts eventually lead to the historic Battle of San Jacinto and a very clever bit of battlefield strategy by Houston in his fight against forces led by Gen. Santa Anna.

programme.title: The Immigrant
programme.desc: An immigrant endures a challenging voyage and gets into trouble as soon as he arrives in America.

programme.title: The Son of Davy Crockett
programme.desc: President Ulysses S. Grant enlists a frontiersman's son to help insure the inclusion of Texas into the Union.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp becomes the new marshal of Dodge City and immediately finds himself fighting off gunmen working for the Big T gang; determined to bring order to the city, Earp gathers local support as the gang holds the sheriff of Ford County under siege.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes links a murder in a quiet English house to a Chicago gangster.

programme.title: Battle Stations
programme.desc: Crewmen (John Lund, William Bendix, Keefe Brasselle) of an Essex class aircraft carrier train for action in the Pacific, then come home.

programme.title: The First Time

Returning safely to Pearl Harbor, Duke meets his ex-wife, Mary (Patricia Neal), who still feels strongly for him but is engaged to a pilot, the brother of Duke's commander, Pop Perry (Ward Bond). Determined to win Mary back, Duke is sidetracked when he and the crew are ordered on a mission with new torpedoes.

programme.title: The Son of Davy Crockett
programme.desc: President Ulysses S. Grant enlists a frontiersman's son to help insure the inclusion of Texas into the Union.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Black Patch
programme.desc: A one-eyed marshal (George Montgomery) puts a bank-robbing buddy in jail, but two greedy locals try to get him out.

programme.title: Hellcats of the Navy
programme.desc: Captain Casey Abbott (Ronald Reagan) commands an American submarine in the Pacific during World War II. When a perilous mission to retrieve a new Japanese mine for study goes awry, he's forced to abandon a likable combat diver, Wes Barton (Harry Lauter). Abbott's orders to leave a man behind appear to be justified, but his second in command, Don Landon (Arthur Franz), believes he had ulterior motives: Barton had been competing for the attention of his love interest, Helen (Nancy Davis).

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: During World War II, a dilapidated vessel, the Caine, gets a new ensign, Willis Keith (Robert Francis), and a new captain, Commander Queeg (Humphrey Bogart). The crew sees Queeg's unconventional behavior as irrational, and communications officer Thomas Keefer (Fred MacMurray) spreads suspicion about his suitability as captain. When a dire situation during a storm forces the executive officer (Van Johnson) to relieve Queeg of his duties, he and Ensign Keith are tried for mutiny.

programme.title: Trouble Along the Way
programme.desc: Once a famous football coach, Steve Williams (John Wayne) is now a bookie in a pool hall. To earn enough money to keep custody of his tomboy daughter, Carole (Sherry Jackson), Steve accepts an offer to take over the football program of impoverished St. Anthony's College in New York City. Disgusted with the team, Steve brings in new players. After his first game nets the school $31,000, an investigation into his shady recruiting methods threatens both his job and custody battle.

programme.title: Odd Man Out
programme.desc: A wounded fugitive's dark odyssey through the streets of Belfast. Following a "fundraising" robbery which goes horribly wrong, the badly injured, abandoned, and increasingly delirious IRA leader wanders the city in search of an escape route from the British authorities.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: The Durango kid aims to break up Pop Ryland's gang of bank robbers but ends up saving the outlaw's son Tommy Ryland who has been marked for death.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Uneasy city council member Jim Kelley must choose a side to support when the council becomes deadlocked on the passage of new laws to give Earp more power, and members of the Big T gear up to attack Dodge City.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes is called in when a top secret document is stolen from the British Foreign Office.

programme.title: Hellcats of the Navy
programme.desc: Captain Casey Abbott (Ronald Reagan) commands an American submarine in the Pacific during World War II. When a perilous mission to retrieve a new Japanese mine for study goes awry, he's forced to abandon a likable combat diver, Wes Barton (Harry Lauter). Abbott's orders to leave a man behind appear to be justified, but his second in command, Don Landon (Arthur Franz), believes he had ulterior motives: Barton had been competing for the attention of his love interest, Helen (Nancy Davis).

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny

The crew sees Queeg's unconventional behavior as irrational, and communications officer Thomas Keefer (Fred MacMurray) spreads suspicion about his suitability as captain. When a dire situation during a storm forces the executive officer (Van Johnson) to relieve Queeg of his duties, he and Ensign Keith are tried for mutiny.

programme.title: Black Patch
programme.desc: A one-eyed marshal (George Montgomery) puts a bank-robbing buddy in jail, but two greedy locals try to get him out.

programme.title: Santa Fe
programme.desc: Three brothers become outlaws after the Civil War, while a fourth sibling goes to work for the railroad.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Pierre Bouelle novel about POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American officers plot to blow up the structure, but the commander of the bridge's construction has different plans.

programme.title: Casanova Brown
programme.desc: Casanova Brown (Gary Cooper) is about to marry Madge (Anita Louise) when he learns that his former wife, Isabel (Teresa Wright), has just had a baby that belongs to him, and plans to put the child up for adoption. Casanova runs out on the wedding, disguises himself as a doctor, visits the hospital where his infant daughter is being held and runs off with her to a hotel, where he does his best to care for the baby. Before long, Madge and Isabel hunt down Casanova, whom they are both furious with.

programme.title: The Verdict
programme.desc: Scotland Yard Superintendent George Edward Grodman (Sydney Greenstreet) is fired after an investigation he heads up results in the wrongful death sentence of an innocent man. Grodman's replacement is the arrogant John R. Buckley (George Coulouris), who haughtily delights in his sudden promotion. Wanting to spite Buckley while also finding redemption for his own mistake, Grodman teams up with artist Victor Emmric (Peter Lorre) to solve a mysterious new murder case.

programme.title: Sea Devils
programme.desc: A smuggler (Rock Hudson) ferries a fake countess (Yvonne De Carlo) to France, unaware she's spying on Napoleon for the British.

programme.title: The Lonesome Trail
programme.desc: A group of conniving land-grabbers is deterred from further evil by a Western Robin Hood armed with a bow and arrow.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: Paid Programming: Carshield -- Cars Have Changed
The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson uncover a plot to marry a beautiful music teacher for her inheritance.

programme.title: Arts In Motion
programme.desc: Discover the world of art through captivating stories and stunning visuals. Explore the creativity and inspiration behind incredible works of art.

programme.desc: A number of countries around the world are calling on Israel to ensure that its military operation in Gaza complies with its obligations under international law. BBC Verify has asked legal experts whether they think Israel is doing so.

programme.title: Top Ten Record Setters
programme.desc: From extreme temperature swings to the strongest hurricane ever recorded, these are the top 10 record breakers that can't be missed.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
programme.desc: A semi bursts into flames, pushing Jesse and crew to make an urgent recovery; Mountain Recovery fights to free a jackknife during a big storm.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
programme.desc: After a tractor pulling double trailers rolls over during a freak snowstorm, Mountain Recovery faces massive damage and an impossible deadline; heavy winds assault I-80 in Wyoming, closing the highway and pushing Jim and Brendan to their limits.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
programme.desc: When freezing fog ices over I-80, Brendan gets his first test on a rollover recovery; heavy snow causes chaos for Big Jon and Kory as they battle a difficult jackknife; a moving van blasts off the highway in a snowstorm, pushing the Stauffer's team to perform a long pull up a steep incline.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

programme.title: Katrina 20
programme.desc: It's been 20 years since Hurricane Katrina, and we're taking you on a tour of the trail of destruction in this hour-long special. From New Orleans' lower Ninth Ward to the Mississippi Gulf Coast, we'll feature stories on survivors who are still dealing with the impacts of this devastating storm. Jim Cantore will revisit the Armed Forces Retirement Home in Gulfport, MS, where he rode out the hurricane, enduring nearly 30 feet of storm surge.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: Four logging companies in British Columbia fight extreme weather and terrain to ethically harvest one of Canada's most vital resources.

programme.title: Timber Titans
programme.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Cary Quiring is tasked with keeping crucial goods flowing; a wreck that brings three heavies out tests Jamie's new LA Rotator; Aggressive Towing tackles a crucial sideways transport.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: James Luke and the Reliable team contend with two detoured wrecks on the same punishing corner of a narrow route; MSA's Kirpal and sons must stretch a long line to reach a machine stuck on a farm.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Al and Merv team up for a snowy tug of war; with the Canyon Highway closed, Jamie battles a fuel tanker to keep trains moving; a blockage on the only route through the Cascade Mountains forces MSA into a bold move.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Bone-chilling temperatures challenge the teams to pull off recoveries in punishing conditions; Dylan pushes Reliable's military rotator in a new way; media gets a sneak peek at an extraordinary repair effort on Coquihalla, closed after floods.

programme.title: Deadman's Curse
programme.desc: The team in Bute Inlet continues to follow new leads in search of answers regarding a missing or murdered prospector, while David Muise inches closer to gold in Pitt Lake.

programme.title: Deadman's Curse
programme.desc: A hidden 1940s map reveals new clues pointing to the motherlode; the team races season-ending weather through unexplored terrain to find an X that marks the spot where Slumach possibly found his gold.

Helmut, a literature student at the University of Munich, disappoints his adviser, Professor Rosenberg (José Ferrer), by dropping out to join the SS. programme.desc: All the racing, glamour and fun of Derby Day at Epsom Downs, including performances from Shergar and Sea The Stars and interviews with sports and entertainment personalities.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Locate and Destroy: Suave freelance troubleshooter Simon Templar embarks on another adventure. The Saint sets out on the trail of a former Nazi believed to be in South America. S5 Ep12

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: The Captain's Brother's Wife: Classic US detective drama. Captain McNeil's widowed sister-in-law must be protected by Theo when a gambling habit of hers leaves her heavily in debt. S5 Ep16

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: No Licence to Kill: Classic US detective drama. Theo tracks a professional hitman who has come to New York for an assassination, but a jealous rival detective is also seeking glory. S5 Ep17

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: The Look: Classic US action drama series. Thomas attempts to help a Saigon disc jockey who is trying to trace her missing ex-fiance and has become the victim of abusive phone calls. S4 Ep9

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Operation: Silent Night: Classic US action drama series. Thomas, Higgins, TC and Rick get stranded at Christmas on an island that is about to become target practice for the US Navy. S4 Ep10

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: The Prophecy: Tales of the legendary outlaw and his merry men. Prince John descends on Nottingham with a mysterious prisoner and the outlaws devise a plan to free the captive. S2 Ep1

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: The First Slugfest: US robot combat series. A new tournament kicks off in Las Vegas for the Golden Bolt, but the robots must first face the toughest battle ever seen there. S6 Ep29

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: The Halls of Terror: Classic US detective drama. Theo investigates a series of murders at a psychiatric hospital where a doctor is convinced that one of her patients is the killer. S5 Ep18

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: May the Horse Be with You: Classic US detective drama. A retired police officer is hurt after trying to prevent the theft of a racehorse that he illegally housed in the NYPD stables. S5 Ep19

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Jororo Farewell: Classic US action drama series. Thomas befriends a visiting 11-year-old prince whose father was killed by terrorists now threatening the boy's life. S4 Ep11

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: The Case of the Red-Faced Thespian: Classic US action drama series. Thomas sets out to solve a murder and jewel theft, but his efforts are complicated by a delusional Higgins. S4 Ep12

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Flight Plan: Drama series about a suave troubleshooter. Sinister agents kidnap the sister of an ex-RAF pilot with the aim of forcing him into stealing a top-secret jet. S5 Ep13

programme.title: The Motorbike Show
programme.desc: Henry Cole visits Wales to ride the iconic Devil's Bridge ride, joins Sam Lovegrove to buy a rare BSA Goldstar, and tells the fascinating story of two classic British bikes. S8 Ep1

programme.desc: Round Five of the 2025 British Rally Championship is the JDS Machinery Rali Ceredigion, an Aberystwyth-based event that is arguably the flagship rally of the UK.
